specials.special: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

feat.name: Reactive Lash
feat.description: Trigger A creature within reach of the roper's strand leaves a square during a move action it's using. Effect The roper makes a strand Strike against the triggering creature.

feat.name: Light Vulnerability
feat.description: Nyogtha has vulnerability (5) to any object shedding magical light (such as from the light spell). If Nyogtha is in an area illuminated by direct sunlight, all objects used to attack her are treated as if shedding magical light.

feat.name: Shadows of Though
feat.description: Any creature which starts its turn within 5 feet of Nyogtha must succeed on a DC 21 Will save or take 2d12+12 mental damage as Nyogtha conjurs up nightmares in the minds of its victims to assault them.

feat.name: Extend Strands
feat.description: Nyogtha extends or retracts six thin, sticky tendrils from its body. While the strands are extended, Nyogtha takes a -4 circumstance penalty to Stealth checks, and while they're retracted, it can't use its strand Strikes.

feat.name: Flurry of Strands
feat.description: Nyogtha makes a strand Strike with each of its strands (except those that are immobilizing creatures). Each attack must be against a different target. These attacks count toward Nyogtha's multiple attack penalty, but its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the attacks.

feat.name: Pull the Strands
feat.description: Nyogtha pulls every creature grabbed by its strands toward itself. Nyogtha rolls a single Athletics check and compares the results to each immobilized creature's Fortitude DC. Nyogtha pulls each creature it succeeds against up to 25 feet closer and each creature it critically succeeds against up to 50 feet closer.

feat.name: Sticky Strand
feat.description: Any ncreature hit by Nyogtha's strand is enfeebled 1 and grabbed. Each additional hit from a strand increases the enfeebled condition value by 1 (to a maximum of enfeebled 4). The enfeebled value decreases by 1 every 8 hours. Nyogtha can move while it has a creature grabbed with a strand, but it automatically releases the creature if it moves beyond the strand's reach. Nyogtha can release a grabbed creature as a free action. A creature can sever a strand with a target attack that hits AC 27 and deals at least 18 slashing damage. This doesn't deal any damage to Nyogtha herself, though it can no longer attack with a severed strand. If all strands are severed, Nyogtha is reduced to 0 hit points.
